infos.value: I believe you have hired mercenaries to embark with you before, but let us discuss the opposite. You are able to lend your own units, as well.
I will now explain about companions.
You may set one unit per element to be available as a companion, as well as one extra unit for a total of nine units.
It is most beneficial to provide your strongest members as companions.
When another player selects your unit as a companion, you will receive <color=#00ffff>gil</color> as a <color=#00ffff>reward</color>.
Any gil you have been rewarded will be given to you on your <color=#00ffff>first login of the day</color>.
You can set units to be available as companions in <color=#00ffff>Companion Settings</color> on the <color=#00ffff>Formation screen</color>.
Companions can also be set <color=#00ffff>according to their element</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on Companions?
